name: Black Breath
description: '''Black Breath''' is an American [[extreme metal]] band from [[Washington (state)|Washington]] that formed in [[Bellingham, Washington|Bellingham]] in 2006 and later moved to [[Seattle]]. They play [[crust punk]]-influenced [[death metal]]. A key factor of their sound is the "[[Boss HM-2]] Heavy Metal Pedal", which was popularized by bands such as [[Entombed (band)|Entombed]], [[Dismember (band)|Dismember]] and [[Edge of Sanity]] in the early 1990s.
